snippet: An exhibition called “Long Island at Work and at Play,” at the Society for the Preservation of Long Island Antiquities, presents photos of life in the early 20th century.
abstract: Exhibition Long Island at Work and at Play, at the Society for the Preservation of Long Island Antiquities, presents photos of local life in the early 20th century (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: An exhibition called “Long Island at Work and at Play,” at the Society for the Preservation of Long Island Antiquities, presents photos of life in the early 20th century.

headline.seo: A Photo Exhibition of the Way New Yorkers Lived a Century Ago
headline.main: Frozen in Time, With Hints of What Was to Come
